p: The following data were collected: epidemiologic features, history, support therapy needed, imaging tests, laboratory tests on admission, and pharmacologic therapy. All data were obtained after acquiring informed consent from the parents or caregivers of the patients. The hospital ethics committee approved this study. A descriptive analysis of the results was conducted using the SPSS 16.0 software package for Windows (IBM Company, New York, NY). Median and range were used for quantitative data.
